translation.en: Yes, yes, yes.
The Golden Eaglets won against Germany with a 2-0 victory! Yes! Yes! Yes!
translation.it: I Golden Eaglets hanno vinto contro la Germania due a zero! Sì!

translation.en: My people, I said you don't know the value of money.
translation.it: Mio popolo, ho detto che non conoscete il valore dei soldi.

translation.en: Good morning.
-My people-- -Welcome, my good child. Welcome!
-"A" for apple. -[kids] "A" for apple.
-"B" for ball. -[kids] "B" for ball.
-"C" for cup. -[kids] "C" for cup.
Including this one. Put them together.
The ones on the floor?
Pull it well, pull it.
Dust it off well.
Can you see this one? Shake off all the dust off it.
translation.it: Lo vedete questo? Sbattetelo e spolveratelo.

translation.en: Then fold it.
-Mommy. -Fold it and align the edges.
Ah! Tolani!
What is wrong? Tell me.
-My darling, what is wrong? -[sniffles]
Eh? What is wrong with you?
You're not talking? Come on.
Ah. You didn't tell me you were coming.
translation.it: Non hai avvertito del tuo arrivo.

translation.en: You used to write me letters, I collected them.
translation.it: Prima mi scrivevi lettere, le raccoglievo.

translation.en: -Mother, it's not my fault. -All this time, nothing? That's not nice.
translation.it: - Mamma, non è colpa mia. - Tutto questo tempo? Non va bene.

translation.en: You didn't even consider that I'd be missing you. Eh?
translation.it: Non hai neanche pensato che mi saresti mancata?

translation.en: Tolani, come here, my dear.
Look at how frail you are. What has--
Let me get you water.
Let me get you water.
My darling.
Take it.
Well done. Eh!
Look at how thin you are!
What is wrong? Haven't you been eating?
Is it that you lack food? Or is it money?
My God.
look me in the eyes.
What is wrong with you? Why are you so thin?
translation.it: Cosa c'è, perché sei così magra?

translation.en: What is wrong?
Mommy.
-I have suffered. -Ah!
My God.
I have been through so much.
How much for your banana?
Isn't it five kobo?
No, it's too expensive.
So, have you decided what you want to do about Sanwo?
translation.it: Allora, hai deciso cosa fare con Sanwo?

translation.en: Not yet.
How long have you been in the relationship?
Three years.
Don't ask for my advice if you won't take it.
translation.it: Non chiedermi consigli, se non li vuoi ascoltare.

translation.en: If I'm dating a man,
and in six months he hasn't proposed, hasn't done anything, I'm gonna date other people.
translation.it: e non mi fa una proposta entro sei mesi, io inizio a uscire con altri.

translation.en: -[scoffs] -You can still take me out to parties, to the club every Friday, and buy me beer.
translation.it: Puoi portarmi alle feste e nei locali ogni venerdì e offrirmi da bere.

translation.en: But you better not wake up Saturday morning and ask me for breakfast.
translation.it: Ma non svegliarti il sabato mattina chiedendomi la colazione.

translation.en: Six months, maximum.
"War Against Indiscipline."
This is meant to introduce sanity into our lifestyle.
translation.it: Questo dovrebbe introdurre il buonsenso nella nostra vita.

translation.en: You will be jailed if you throw litter out of a bus.
translation.it: Finirete in prigione se lancerete sporcizia dall'autobus.

translation.en: [Tolani, in English] I was never alone in Lagos.
translation.it: Non ero mai sola a Lagos.

translation.en: Not even when I wanted to be.
I always had people around me.
Far too many.
My roommate Rose was someone I could ask for advice.
translation.it: La mia coinquilina Rose, era una a cui poter chiedere consigli.

translation.en: She spoke her mind.
Whether or not I was ready to listen.
translation.it: Che fossi disposta ad ascoltarla o no.

translation.en: [Tolani] Though we were in separate departments.
I was in loans.
She was our branch manager's personal secretary.
translation.it: Lei era la segretaria personale del manager.

translation.en: -And she couldn't stand him. -Yes?
I had no problems with my manager.
translation.it: Io non avevo problemi con il mio manager.

translation.en: Here's the file, sir.
Put it in my office. Okay, sir.
translation.it: - Mettili nel mio ufficio. - Sì, signore!

translation.en: [Tolani] Most days, I didn't see Rose until lunchtime anyway.
translation.it: Spesso non vedevo Rose fino all'ora di pranzo.

translation.en: We would join the line to buy food with other clerks.
translation.it: Ci mettevamo in fila per il cibo con altri impiegati.

translation.en: Like Godwin, a born-again Christian who worked in my department.
translation.it: Come Godwin, un cristiano rinato che lavorava nel mio ufficio.

translation.en: [Tolani] And Franca, the office gossip.
Ignatius was the most senior clerk and we all respected him.
translation.it: Ignatius era l'impiegato più anziano e lo rispettavamo tutti.

translation.en: He was in charge of maintaining personnel files.
translation.it: Era incaricato della gestione dei file del personale.

translation.en: Hakeem, a bad-tempered man from customer service.
translation.it: Hakeem, un uomo irascibile dell'ufficio assistenza clienti.

translation.en: [singing] ♪ Is it when my water finish? ♪
Oh, Nepa!
[Tolani] I had other tenants who I could turn to,
translation.it: Avevo altre persone a cui potermi rivolgere,

translation.en: older women who were more mature.
[woman] It's okay.
It's okay now.
[Tolani] There was Mama Chidi,
who had three young children and was heavily pregnant with another.
translation.it: Che aveva tre figli ed era incinta di un altro.

translation.en: Mama, the beans are burning.
She loved reading so much that she would've been a professor in an ideal world.
translation.it: Le piaceva moltissimo leggere, in un mondo ideale sarebbe stata un'insegnante.

translation.en: Reduce it.
[Tolani] There was Mrs. Durojaye,
but she was usually at work.
translation.it: ma di solito era al lavoro.

translation.en: And the way she disciplined her sons didn't encourage me to approach her.
translation.it: Il modo con cui educava i suoi figli non mi incoraggiava ad avvicinarmi a lei.

translation.en: You want to be a useless child? You want to kill me? Do you want to kill me? Ah!
translation.it: Vuoi fare il bambino inutile! Vuoi farmi morire?

translation.en: I talk and you ignore me.
translation.it: Io ti parlo e mi ignori.

translation.en: Try it next time and see what happens. You'll deal with me!
translation.it: Provaci ancora e vedrai che succede. Spostati là!

translation.en: Go and kneel down over there.
What is the problem? Did I make a mistake giving birth to you?
translation.it: Qual è il problema? Ho forse sbagliato a farti nascere?

translation.en: Your useless father has gambled all his money! I'm the only one working!
translation.it: Il vostro inutile padre ha buttato tutti i soldi nel gioco d'azzardo! Lavoro solo io!

translation.en: I work morning, afternoon, night and you won't let me have any peace!
translation.it: Lavoro mattina, pomeriggio e notte. Voi non mi lasciate in pace.

translation.en: Ayo, can you see your older siblings?
translation.it: Ayo, vedi i tuoi fratelli maggiori?

translation.en: Don't behave like them!
translation.it: Li vedi? Non essere come loro!

translation.en: Don't become like them at all. What is it?
translation.it: Non diventare come loro! Cosa c'è?

translation.en: Why do I have to yell every day? Are we the only ones who live here?
translation.it: Mi fate urlare ogni giorno, siamo gli unici a vivere qui?

translation.en: -Is this your friend? -My friend Tolani.
Hi Tolani!
-Hi! -Tolani meet…
-What do you want to drink? -Beer.
[Tolani] Sanwo, food is ready.
[Sanwo] Mmm. Thank you.
Who shaved your mustache?
translation.it: Chi ti ha tagliato i baffi?

translation.en: You like it, right? It's my new style.
translation.it: Ti piacciono? È il mio nuovo stile.

translation.en: Your barber must not like you.
translation.it: Quella persona non ti vuole bene.

translation.en: Her, concerning the matter of…
my dowry.
What about it?
It's been three years since we started dating.
translation.it: Sono già tre anni che ci frequentiamo.

translation.en: Just last year, you told me to give you some more time.
translation.it: L'anno scorso, ti ho detto che ti avrei dato tempo.

translation.en: But, when exactly are you planning to meet my family
translation.it: Ma quando conoscerai la mia famiglia?

translation.en: so we can make this official?
Let's do the proper thing so you can pay my dowry.
translation.it: Per poter fare la cosa giusta. Così potrai pagare la mia dote nuziale.

translation.en: I don't understand why it's taking so long. What's wrong?
translation.it: Perché ci metti così tanto? Qual è il problema?

translation.en: I just don't want to end up one of those women who are disappointed by a man.
translation.it: Non voglio diventare come quelle donne abbandonate, che piangono sempre. Ok?

translation.en: Why this talk now?
I'm just telling you this because time is running out.
translation.it: Sto solo dicendo quello che penso. Perché il tempo sta scadendo.

translation.en: For who?
All right.
Where would we live?
[scoffs] We will live together like every married couple.
translation.it: Vivremmo insieme come tutte le coppie sposate.

translation.en: Do you know how much rent is in this town?
Don't I live in the same Lagos as you, hustling every day?
translation.it: No, perché non è la stessa Lagos in cui vivo io, dandomi da fare tutto il giorno, vivo a Oshogbo?

translation.en: Do I live in Oshogbo?
translation.it: dandomi da fare tutto il giorno, vivo a Oshogbo?

translation.en: Uh… even Rose, she said I should give you six months maximum.
translation.it: Anche Rose ha detto che dovrei darti al massimo sei mesi di tempo.

translation.en: And if you're not ready, maybe I should break up with you.
translation.it: E se non tu sei pronto, dovrei lasciarti.

translation.en: -You better not listen to her. -Hmm.
She's just jealous.
-Jealous of what? -Uh.
She sees that you're in a steady relationship and she can't take it.
translation.it: Vede che hai una relazione stabile e non ne è felice.

translation.en: She has never liked me from the very start.
translation.it: Non le sono mai piaciuto, dal primo istante.

translation.en: Somebody that can't keep a man, that's who gives you advice?
translation.it: Una che non sa tenersi un uomo vuole dare consigli?

translation.en: All right.
What about your uncle?
The one that sends you on errands, then gives you little or no money afterward.
translation.it: Quello che ti manda a fare faccende e dopo ti dà pochissimi soldi.

translation.en: But when he wants to go to England and America,
translation.it: Ma quando vuole andare in Inghilterra e in America,

translation.en: he will get on a first class plane.
translation.it: prende un aereo in prima classe.

translation.en: When he wants to travel within Nigeria, he will call you,
translation.it: Quando vuole viaggiare in Nigeria, chiama te.

translation.en: "Sanwo, let's go." Why is that? Why?
translation.it: Sanwo, andiamo. Perché lo farebbe? Perché?

translation.en: Go and ask him.
-I should go and ask him? -Mm.
Is that someone that wishes you well?
translation.it: Una persona del genere vuole il tuo bene?

translation.en: Look, Tolani. Leave my uncle out of this. You hear?
translation.it: Tolani. Lascia perdere mio zio. Hai sentito?

translation.en: -I'm sure it's because of his wife. -Mm.
translation.it: Sicuramente è colpa di sua moglie.

translation.en: Sure, she's to blame. That's true.
translation.it: Certo, è colpa sua. È vero.

translation.en: -She's the one. -Mm.
I'm not even here to discuss that either.
translation.it: Non sono qui per discutere di quello.

translation.en: The discussion is two ways now, hmm?
translation.it: Le discussioni sono a doppio senso.

translation.en: You've said your speech, let me say my own.
translation.it: Tu hai parlato, ora parlo io.

translation.en: Talk.
I'm listening.
I know you're getting frustrated.
-I'm working on a new deal. -Ha.
translation.it: Sto lavorando su un nuovo affare.

translation.en: -This one is different. -I said I don't want to hear it. Ah.
translation.it: - Questo è diverso. - Non voglio saperne niente.

translation.en: That's fine then.
Are you upset?
All right, what deal?
-All you have to know is it's risk-free. -Mm..
translation.it: Ti basti sapere che non corro rischi.

translation.en: Tolani, I won't disappoint you. I'm not a bastard.
translation.it: Tolani, non ti deluderò, non sono un bastardo.

translation.en: -I'd like to believe so. -I'm just playing with you.
translation.it: - Ti ricorderò cos'hai detto. - Ti prendo in giro.

translation.en: -Come here. -Leave me alone.
-My sister. -Uncle.
Have you heard?
-Salako sacked Rose. -What! Why?
translation.it: - Salako ha licenziato Rose. - Cosa? Perché?

translation.en: She slapped him.
It was from Franca I heard it.
-When? -Thirty minutes ago.
But you know what? I will confirm it once I discuss her case with my madam.
translation.it: Ma sai che ti dico? Avrò la conferma appena ne discuterò con la mia signora.

translation.en: How come Franca was the first to hear?
Ah, I don't know, but you know that all bad news comes from that woman's mouth.
translation.it: Ah, non lo so, ma sai che tutte le brutte notizie arrivano dalla sua bocca.

translation.en: She must be lying.
Well, she swears that she saw them with her two naked eyes.
translation.it: Ah, beh, giura di averlo visto con i stessi suoi occhi.

translation.en: So where is Rose now?
She left.
I only came to tell you because you're her friend.
translation.it: Sono venuto a dirtelo perché sei sua amica.

translation.en: Thank you.
Had I been around, she wouldn't have done it.
translation.it: Se ci fossi stato io nelle vicinanze, non l'avrebbe fatto.

translation.en: How?
I would have calmed her down.
It was about time. Rose does not know how to control herself.
translation.it: Era ora. - Rose non sa controllarsi. - Come?

translation.en: How?
And Salako has been letting her get away with it?
translation.it: E Salako gliel'ha fatta passare liscia.

translation.en: -That's it. -How?
We should pray for her.
Pray for who? Everybody knows she's Salako's girlfriend.
translation.it: Pregare per chi? Tutti sanno che è la ragazza di Salako.

translation.en: -Ah, is that new? -[clears throat]
Ah, Tolani, how are you?
-Have you heard? -Heard what?
Don't bear false witness.
Face your food, pastor. Who is talking to you?
translation.it: Pensa al cibo, Pastore. Nessuno parla con te.

translation.en: It's Rose's concern and no one else's. [tsk]
translation.it: Sono fatti di Rose e di nessun altro.

translation.en: Just be talking anyhow.
Me, I like her, I'm just concerned.
translation.it: A me piace lei, sono solo preoccupata.

translation.en: Who else was there apart from Ignatius?
Um, Godwin. But he was all right.
translation.it: Godwin. Ma lui non ha sparlato.

translation.en: Hakeem too was trying to open his mouth, but Franca was the actual devil.
translation.it: Anche Hakeem cercava di ficcare becco, ma il vero diavolo era Franka.

translation.en: She was lucky I wasn't there to deal with her.
translation.it: È fortunata che non fossi lì.

translation.en: It's her type that sleeps with useless men like Salako.
translation.it: Quelle come lei ad andare a letto con uomini inutili come Salako.

translation.en: Why did he sack you? Because he is a bastard.
translation.it: - Perché ti ha licenziata? - Perché è un bastardo.

translation.en: It won't end well for him, the stress he put me through at that bank.
translation.it: E verrà distrutto per cosa mi ha fatto in quella banca.

translation.en: He touched me up and down.
Did you slap him?
Why does it matter?
Why now Rose? Why?
Tolani, because women like me and you never get justice in this country.
translation.it: Tolani, perché le donne come me e te non ottengono mai giustizia in questo Paese.

translation.en: Only criminals get justice.
Look at him. Can't you see how corrupt he is?
translation.it: Hai visto come vive? Quanto è corrotto?

translation.en: He steals from the bank, steals from the customers
translation.it: Ruba dalla banca, ruba dai clienti, e prende comunque mazzette.

translation.en: Him and that snake Umar.
translation.it: Lui e quel serpente di Umar.

translation.en: [sucks teeth] Forget that one.
translation.it: - Lascia perdere quello. - Umar è complice.

translation.en: Umar is a part of it, he's a part too!.
translation.it: - Lascia perdere quello. - Umar è complice. È un complice.

translation.en: Those bad debt letters you've been typing, you think they'll be repaid?
translation.it: Pensi che le lettere di debito che scrivi verranno ripagate?

translation.en: Salako opens an account for a big man
translation.it: Salako apre un conto per un ricco e il ricco…

translation.en: and Umar gives the big man a loan.
translation.it: Salako apre un conto per un ricco e il ricco… Umar dà un prestito al ricco.

translation.en: -Hmm. -Big man then gives them both a cut.
translation.it: Umar dà un prestito al ricco. Il ricco dà una percentuale a entrambi.

translation.en: But the three of them know the loan will never be repaid.
translation.it: Ma tutti e tre sanno che non ripagheranno il debito.

translation.en: What you think happens with those dormant accounts?
translation.it: Cosa pensi che accadrà con tutti quei conti?

translation.en: Salako is using them as his personal accounts.
It's why he's early every morning.
So he can steal from them.
The government ministers steal, even the president steals.
translation.it: I ministri del governo rubano, anche il presidente ruba.

translation.en: Then you toil and work hard,
but still can't afford to buy meat to put in your lunch in the afternoon.
translation.it: ma non puoi permetterti di comprare la carne per il pranzo nel pomeriggio.

translation.en: If I ever see that man again, I will deal with him.
translation.it: Se mai dovessi rivederlo, mi occuperò io di lui.

translation.en: Please my sister, just take it easy.
translation.it: Ti prego, sorella, cerca di calmarti.

translation.en: My work of seven years. Seven years.
translation.it: Ho lavorato per sette anni. Sette anni.

translation.en: Show me one person that can type faster in that bank.
translation.it: Trova qualcuno che scriva più veloce di me.

translation.en: Show me one person whose shorthand is better than mine. Show me!
translation.it: Trova qualcuno che sappia stenografare meglio di me!

translation.en: So what are you going to do now?
Don't worry. I'll take care of myself.
Our rent is due.
I'll talk to Vali-- Violet.
Are you sure?
Yes, if I can't ask her for money, who else can I ask?
translation.it: Sì. Se non posso chiedere soldi a lei, a chi altro chiedo?

translation.en: Ah. Okay.
Have you eaten?
I don't feel like eating.
-[speaking Italian] Come stai? -[speaking Italian] Va bene.
Oh, grazie, you speak Italiano?
Ah, I stayed in Italy.
You know, when I was in Italy, I went to their "Vasasi" store.
translation.it: Quando ero in Italia, sono andata nel negozio "Vasasi".

translation.en: -Versace. -Ah.
Ah! Mamma mia, very good fashion.
Ah, I'm telling you, I stayed in Italy.
All right.
Yes.
-[laughing] -Morning.
Morning sister Vio.
Good morning. Rose. Why are you here?
translation.it: Buongiorno, Rose, cosa ci fai qui?

translation.en: I need to talk to you.
Go wait for me.
Go wait for me now.
-Hi there. -Hey, aunty.
-I'll be back soon, hmm? Pronto. -[chuckles]
Mabel!
You see this one? Hmm? Just this one.
-Yes. -You finish loosening it.
-Okay, ma. -I'll be right back.
-Pronto. -No problem.
Rose, what is it?
I want to borrow some money.
-I don't have money. -How?
I don't have money.
Why didn't you ask Tolani?
Why would I ask her? Is she my relative?
translation.it: Perché a lei? Non è una mia parente.

translation.en: Anyway, I don't have money.
I've come all this way!
-You should've called. -What phone am I going to use?
translation.it: Dovevi chiamare prima. - E come? - Non ci sono telefoni nella tua zona?

translation.en: -Aren't there call centers in your area? -There are no working lines in my area.
translation.it: - E come? - Non ci sono telefoni nella tua zona? Per favore, non ci sono telefoni funzionanti.

translation.en: Rose, I don't have money.
I don't have. Can you hear me?
translation.it: Non ne ho. Mi hai sentito?

translation.en: The last time I borrowed you money, it took you a long time to return my money.
translation.it: L'ultima volta che te ne ho prestati, ci hai messo tantissimo a restituirmeli.

translation.en: Therefore, I don't have money to give you.
translation.it: Quindi non ho soldi da prestarti.

translation.en: But Fedele sends you money every month.
translation.it: Ma Fedele ti manda soldi ogni mese.

translation.en: For his daughter.
In foreign currency?
See, we are talking of lira. Lira is not that strong.
translation.it: Stiamo parlando della lira, che non è così forte.

translation.en: It's not like we are talking about dollars or pounds sterling.
translation.it: Non è come parlare di dollari o sterline.

translation.en: But you have money to live in Keffi and to rent a shop in Onikan?
translation.it: Ma hai i soldi per vivere a Keffi e affittare un negozio a Onikan?

translation.en: Will you behave yourself?
I don't have time for this nonsense.
translation.it: Non ho tempo per queste sciocchezze.

translation.en: What is the matter with you?
I don't have money to lend you.
translation.it: Ti ho detto che non soldi.

translation.en: The only thing I can do is,
give you a little bit, you know, something to get you by.
translation.it: è darti qualcosa per tirare avanti.

translation.en: Sisi said we should help each other. That's what she said.
translation.it: Sisi diceva che dovremmo sempre aiutarci. Diceva quello.

translation.en: Sisi can say whatever she likes!
-Really! -Yes! What? It's the truth.
translation.it: - Davvero? - Sì, che c'è? È la verità.

translation.en: Ah-ah. Sisi can say whatever she wants.
That's small town talk. Let me tell you.
Sisi had so many children. In fact, too many and she can't afford them.
translation.it: Sisi ha avuto tanti figli, troppi. Così tanti che non se li può permettere.

translation.en: If it wasn't for my father, I wouldn't have gone to Italy.
translation.it: Se non fosse stato per mio padre, non sarei andata in Italia.

translation.en: I wouldn't have met Fedele. I wouldn't have had my child.
translation.it: Non avrei conosciuto Fedele e non avrei avuto una figlia.

translation.en: In fact, I wouldn't be sitting here today.
translation.it: In effetti non avrei tutto questo, non sarei qui.

translation.en: Vio, you'll never see me insulting Sisi.
translation.it: Vio, io non insulto mai Sisi così.

translation.en: My dad paid for my secretarial studies, if you don't know.
translation.it: E mio padre ha pagato i miei studi, se non lo sai.

translation.en: I know. That's the only thing he could help her with.
translation.it: Lo so. Era l'unico modo in cui potesse aiutare.

translation.en: Don't insult my father, don't try it. Don't even go there.
translation.it: Non insultare mio padre, non ci provare nemmeno.

translation.en: -My father was a generous man. -Hm.
Generous indeed.
The only thing is that his salary as a teacher
translation.it: L'unica cosa è che il suo stipendio da insegnante

translation.en: didn't afford him any luxuries. Just the little things--
translation.it: non gli ha concesso lussi. Solo piccole cose…

translation.en: Ah, Violet you have-- you have a bad mouth!
translation.it: Ah, Vio, hai proprio una boccaccia!

translation.en: You talk nonsense.
-What about yours? -Sisi said it! You have a bad mouth.
translation.it: - E tu? - L'ha detto lei! Tu sparli.

translation.en: And yours isn't uncouth? Look at you, hypocrite. Am I your senior?
translation.it: E tu non hai una boccaccia? Che ipocrita. Siamo coetanee, forse?

translation.en: Don't be rude to me. But really, weren't we brought up together?
translation.it: Non parlarmi così. Non ci hanno cresciute allo stesso modo?

translation.en: Tell me, were we not raised the same way?
translation.it: Dimmi, non siamo state cresciute allo stesso modo?

translation.en: Didn't we drink garri and water together?
Hmm? Rose, I don't have money. Am I clear?
translation.it: Rose. Non ho soldi. Sono stata chiara?

translation.en: Oh, so now you've become a big woman in Lagos.
translation.it: Ah, quindi ora sei una donna importante a Lagos.

translation.en: No problem. Everybody has their time.
translation.it: Non c'è problema. Ognuno ha il suo momento.

translation.en: I don't have money.
[kid] Ma!
Bring what I asked you to bring for me.
translation.it: Portami quel che ti ho chiesto.

translation.en: ♪ If you want to marry a woman ♪
-Mama Chidi. -Please go and bring the second one.
translation.it: - Mama Chidi. - Vai a prenderne un altro.

translation.en: [chuckles] Mrs. Durojaye.
-How are you? -I'm fine, welcome.
I admire your car. It takes you out and brings you back.
translation.it: Questa è la tua auto, che ti porta fuori e ti riporta a casa?

translation.en: It really helps. Mama Chidi, to have a car really helps.
translation.it: Mi è molto d'aiuto. Mama Chidi, avere un'auto è davvero d'aiuto.

translation.en: Hey, I can't forget when the last one finally broke down.
translation.it: Ehi, non dimenticherò mai quando l'ultima si è rotta.

translation.en: Ah! Mama Chidi, I struggled.
But we thank God. We thank God.
My sister, maybe one day Papa Chidi too will be able to buy one.
translation.it: Sorella mia, se… Forse anche Papa Chidi un giorno ne comprerà una.

translation.en: What are you thinking? It's fairly used.
-Really? -Yes. Imported.
My sister, I'll be happy with any one,
translation.it: Sorella mia, qualsiasi auto mi andrebbe bene,

translation.en: whether it's used or an imported car.
As long as it's from overseas, it's okay.
But see, you will have to wait till after twelve noon
translation.it: Però dovrai aspettare fin dopo mezzogiorno

translation.en: on sanitation day before you go out.
translation.it: nei giorni di sanificazione, per uscire.

translation.en: And if you must get a number plate license,
translation.it: E se devi prendere una targa,

translation.en: it has to be the type of mine, an odd number.
translation.it: dev'essere come la mia, con un numero dispari.

translation.en: So that you can at least go out three times in a week.
translation.it: Per poter uscire almeno tre volte alla settimana.

translation.en: Even me during weekdays, I wake up very, very early.
translation.it: Nei giorni feriali mi sveglio molto presto.

translation.en: As early as 5:00 a.m. to go out.
Because anything after 7:00, that's another problem.
translation.it: Perché dopo le 7:00 è un problema.

translation.en: That is a good thing.
-Ah-ah. Rose. Welcome. How are you? -Mama Chidi.
translation.it: - Rose. Benvenuta. Come stai? - Mama Chidi.

translation.en: I'm fine, how are your children?
translation.it: Sto bene, come stanno i tuoi figli?

translation.en: We thank God. We're planning to cook beans today.
translation.it: Ringraziamo Dio, oggi vogliamo cucinare fagioli.

translation.en: How is Papa Chidi?
He's fine, thanks to God. Welcome, eh.
translation.it: Sta bene, grazie a Dio. Benvenuta.

translation.en: Well done.
Rubbish.
An extremely useless individual.
translation.it: Che persona sciocca e inutile, non vale nulla.

translation.en: Worthless and no use to anyone.
-Okay, Mama Chidi. -Hm?
I'm going inside.
Let me go and remove my drawers, I'm sweating.
translation.it: Vado a togliere le mutande, sto sudando.

translation.en: Okay.
What a pity.
Not at all, Vio is wicked. Sisi told me already.
translation.it: No, per niente, Vio è cattiva. Sisi me l'aveva detto.

translation.en: She said if Vio saw her injured on the road,
translation.it: Diceva che se stesse morendo e Vio la vedesse,

translation.en: she'd leave her to die.
At least she should send money to your mother now.
translation.it: Almeno ora dovrebbe mandare dei soldi a tua madre.

translation.en: What? What are you saying?
Sisi has never gotten even one single kobo from Vio since she came back from Italy.
translation.it: Sisi non ha mai ricevuto un kobo da Vio da quando è tornata dall'Italia.

translation.en: For real?
Not even one!
She only knows how to shout "mamma mia," when she has customers.
translation.it: Sa solo urlare "mamma mia", quando ha dei clienti.

translation.en: She doesn't want anyone to know we're sisters.
translation.it: Non vuole si sappia che siamo sorelle.

translation.en: She doesn't understand any Italian! She doesn't, she's just pretending.
translation.it: Non capisce l'italiano! Non lo capisce, finge soltanto.

translation.en: And she met Fedele when she was cleaning his house!
translation.it: Come non ha conosciuto Fedele quando gli puliva la casa.

translation.en: Please, I'm starting to have a headache.
translation.it: Inizio ad avere il mal di testa.

translation.en: This world…
I'm thinking maybe I should even be grateful.
translation.it: Sto pensando che forse dovrei pure essere grata.

translation.en: That Mrs., uh…
Durojaye…
translation.it: - Durojaiye… - Sì, o come si fa chiamare.

translation.en: Whatever she calls herself. Her.
translation.it: - Durojaiye… - Sì, o come si fa chiamare. Lei. Un giorno ucciderà i figli con le sue mani.

translation.en: One day she'll kill one of her children.
translation.it: Lei. Un giorno ucciderà i figli con le sue mani.

translation.en: When I passed her just now,
she was giving me the stink eye, like I stole her husband.
translation.it: mi ha guardato male, come se le avessi rubato il marito.

translation.en: -[laughs] -No wonder the man divorced her.
translation.it: Ci credo che l'ha lasciata. Chi vorrebbe vedere ogni mattina

translation.en: Who wants to wake up to such an angry face every day?
translation.it: Ci credo che l'ha lasciata. Chi vorrebbe vedere ogni mattina quella faccia arrabbiata?

translation.en: One day she'll kill one of her children.
translation.it: Un giorno ucciderà i figli con le sue mani.

translation.en: Is there any food?
Umar. That is it, see me later in my office.
translation.it: Umar. Abbiamo finito. Vieni nel mio ufficio dopo.

translation.en: -Tolani. -Yes, sir?
See me in my office.
Mr. Salako has requested that you be transferred downstairs, to work with him.
translation.it: Il sig. Salako ha chiesto di trasferirti di sotto, per lavorare con lui.

translation.en: Why, sir?
He wants someone from within the bank to replace his secretary.
translation.it: Vuole qualcuno di questa banca per sostituire la sua segretaria.

translation.en: I've told him that you'll be available from tomorrow.
translation.it: Gli ho detto che sarai disponibile da domani.

translation.en: I want you to clean out your desk today and report to him downstairs.
translation.it: Voglio che oggi sgomberi la tua scrivania e vada da lui di sotto.

translation.en: But I have plenty of letters to type, sir.
translation.it: Ma ho tante lettere da scrivere, signore.

translation.en: What letters?
Bad debts. There's so many of them and…
translation.it: Per i debiti. Ce ne sono così tante e…

translation.en: Sir, please, I like it here in loans.
translation.it: Signore, la prego, mi piace qui ai prestiti.

translation.en: Mr. Salako has requested that you be transferred.
translation.it: Il sig. Salako ha richiesto il tuo trasferimento.

translation.en: Yes.
Come in.
Alhaji Umar said I should report to you sir.
translation.it: Alhaji Umar mi ha detto di venire da lei, signore.

translation.en: Hm, yes, um, Miss Ajao.
I had a meeting with him regarding,
translation.it: Ho parlato con lui riguardo a…

translation.en: my former secretary. What's her name?
translation.it: Alla mia precedente segretaria. Come si chiama?

translation.en: What's her name again?
-Rose Adamson, sir. -Mm-hmm!
I think you are the suitable person for that… office.
translation.it: Penso che tu sia la persona adatta per quell'ufficio.

translation.en: Because whenever I see you, you always appear neat.
translation.it: Perché… ogni volta che ti vedo, mi sembri ordinata. Molto ordinata.

translation.en: Very neat.
translation.it: ogni volta che ti vedo, mi sembri ordinata. Molto ordinata.

translation.en: Eh. And you're a Yoruba girl?
-Yes sir. -Okay.
Please, you are from where?
Makoku, sir.
Makoku. Makoku interior I guess.
We're not interior people. We're Egba, sir.
Did you say Egba?
Yes, sir.
Okay. What does your father do?
translation.it: - Sì, signore. - Ok. Cosa fa tuo padre?

translation.en: My father was a drummer sir.
translation.it: Mio padre era un batterista, signore.

translation.en: Was a drummer? Oh.
He's passed on. What a pity. May God grant him heavenly rest.
translation.it: È mancato. Che peccato. Che Dio lo abbia in gloria.

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
God grant him heavenly rest. And your mother?
translation.it: - Grazie, signore. - Riposi in pace. E tua madre?

translation.en: My mother makes adire. She's a cloth dyer sir.
translation.it: Mia madre fa tintura a riserva. Tinge i vestiti, signore.

translation.en: Hm. I see. I see. Whatever, they raised you well.
translation.it: Capisco. Comunque ti hanno cresciuta bene.

translation.en: You have manners.
Anyway, what about your diction?
Diction, English. My diction, sir?
Your diction! Ah, don't you understand English?
translation.it: La tua pronuncia! Non capisci l'inglese?

translation.en: How do you… do you speak and write?
My diction is fine, sir.
Uh, what… whatever, let's give it to Rose. Hm.
Her English grammar, diction
translation.it: Il suo inglese, la grammatica, la pronuncia,

translation.en: were excellent. Very excellent.
Anyway, you will go to her desk now, clean the desk for me.
translation.it: Comunque ora vai alla sua scrivania, puliscila per me.

translation.en: Because the last time I tried to check the desk,
translation.it: Perché l'ultima volta che l'ho controllata,

translation.en: the whole place looked horrible.
Like, uh, she packed a lot of juju there.
-Juju? -Yes, juju. Hmm.
Like you don't know what juju is.
-Go and clean the place. -[phone ringing]
Hello.
Hello, sir.
Yes, sir. Yes, sir.
You don't know my job, you don't know what my job entails.
translation.it: Non conosci il mio lavoro, non sai cosa implica il mio lavoro.

translation.en: You don't know anything.
There's nothing that entails anything in that… in that bank.
translation.it: Non c'è nulla che implichi qualcosa in quella banca.

translation.en: All the work I was doing for Alhaji Umar last week, he didn't even know.
translation.it: Ho fatto del lavoro per Alhaji Umar che non sapeva cosa fosse.

translation.en: What could it possibly entail?
You say hello to a customer, the customer says hello to you. Finish!
translation.it: Tu saluti il cliente, il cliente ti saluta. Finito lì!

translation.en: Look, when a customer comes in or they call on the phone,
translation.it: Quando un cliente arriva o chiama al telefono,

translation.en: the way you interact with them
should make them relaxed and very comfortable.
translation.it: dovrebbe rilassarli e metterli a proprio agio.

translation.en: I did all this there.
I don't want to.
So why not tell him you didn't want the job?
translation.it: Allora perché non gli dici di no?

translation.en: How?
This man knows what he's doing.
He's doing it because he knows we live together.
translation.it: Sa bene quel che fa. Perché sa che viviamo insieme.

translation.en: He wants me to come and beg him.
Over my dead body. I'll never go beg him.
translation.it: Neanche morta. Non vado a implorare.

translation.en: Is he that scared of juju?
That man? He's worse than an illiterate.
translation.it: Quell'uomo? È peggio di un analfabeta.

translation.en: And that smell in his office, what is it?
translation.it: E quella puzza nel suo ufficio, cos'è?

translation.en: He farts. He farts a lot.
You'll get used to it.
And you'll get used to it when he starts touching you.
translation.it: E ti abituerai quando inizierà a toccarti.

translation.en: God forbid.
Johnny, Johnny.
Ah, Rambling Rose! Don't contaminate this contraband.
translation.it: Rose la chiacchierona. Non contaminare questa roba.

translation.en: You never ask after me.
-Do you ask? -This is my only wife in Lagos.
translation.it: - E tu chiedi di me? - Lei è mia moglie a Lagos.

translation.en: So tell me, where are you guys rambling to today?
We want to buy shoes, but your shoes are always too expensive…
translation.it: Vogliamo delle scarpe, ma le tue costano troppo.

translation.en: Is that so!
translation.it: - Per questo non veniamo. - Ah, sì?

translation.en: So that's why you never patronize me. No problem.
translation.it: È per questo che non mi tratti con condiscendenza.

translation.en: This is my friend, I'm taking him to a boutique.
translation.it: Lui è mio amico, lo porto a quel negozio.

translation.en: You know he doesn't shop around here. We need to upgrade.
translation.it: Lui non compra qui attorno. Dobbiamo migliorarci.

translation.en: Hello.
Eh, O to the C! OC Money!
You see these two, they're my favorite customers in Lagos.
translation.it: Vedi queste due, le mie clienti preferite a Lagos.

translation.en: Now see this one, he's an original fly guy!
translation.it: Ora vedete lui, lui è il più forte!

translation.en: He just came back from United States.
translation.it: È appena tornato dagli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: -Of America? -Is there another one?
Really? Okay then.
-This one is your size. -Buy these for me.
translation.it: - È la tua taglia. - Comprami queste.

translation.en: -You mean this? -Hm.
Baby, see.
Austerity measures.
Ah, Johnny, you haven't changed, you're still stingy, Please leave my shoes.
translation.it: - Johnny, non cambi mai, sempre tirchio. - Lascia le scarpe.

translation.en: -How much is it? -Five naira, that seven naira.
-How much? -I'll pay two naira fifty kobo.
Seven naira. I'm paying two naira, 50 kobo.
translation.it: - Sette naira. Buon prezzo. - Queste? Due naira e 50.

translation.en: -Did you tell her five? -It's seven.
It's seven naira.
-Five naira. -Five for the two of them.
No. Okay, you pay six naira.
-We don't have that. Two naira, 50 kobo. -No.
translation.it: - Non li abbiamo. Due naira e 50. - Ma dai.

translation.en: -Hey Johnny! -Yes?
No time, you know. I'll pay.
-OC Money! -It's all good.
Okay! Put it in a bag.
Thank you. My name is Rose.
My name is OC. But my friends call me OC Money.
translation.it: Mi chiamo OC, ma gli amici mi chiamano OC Money.

translation.en: What are you doing with this person, he doesn't like spending money.
translation.it: Cosa fai con uno come lui, non gli piace spendere soldi.

translation.en: [laughs] He's a cool guy, you know, very cool guy.
Can I come visit you?
Sure.
All right, you should give me your address.
translation.it: Va bene, allora dovresti darmi il tuo indirizzo.

translation.en: -My address? -Yes.
-So, we'll see. -Yeah.
-Take care. -Yeah.
He's nice.
-Who? -Uh-uh.
-OC now. -You don't know him, let's go.
You?
Come in.
Please make yourself comfortable.
translation.it: Fa' come se fossi a casa tua.

translation.en: Here we are.
So what can I offer you?
Beer.
What is it?
Let me get you some wine instead.
No, I only drink beer.
It's not ladylike.
Wine is better, trust me.
I'll drink whatever you give me.
translation.it: Ok, bevo quello che mi dai.

translation.en: Wine it is. I'll be right back.
Ah, you should've seen OC's house, there's no gadget he doesn't have.
translation.it: Avresti dovuto vedere la casa di OC, ha ogni tipo di gadget.

translation.en: And he's as generous as my father.
translation.it: Ed è generoso come mio padre.

translation.en: Can you imagine?
When I was there, what's his name… Johnny came by.
translation.it: Mentre ero lì è venuto… Come si chiama? Johnny.

translation.en: He started asking me questions when OC went to the kitchen.
translation.it: Ha iniziato a farmi domande mentre OC era in cucina.

translation.en: -Okay, so feel free okay? -Okay.
Rose,
what is going on between you and him?
translation.it: Che succede tra te e lui?

translation.en: How is it your business?
I just ignored him. Nonsense.
He claims he is into import and export
translation.it: Aveva detto di interessarsi di import ed export,

translation.en: and yet he never bought me even a drink when we were dating.
translation.it: eppure non mi ha mai offerto da bere quando ci frequentavamo.

translation.en: But now he wants to monitor me, asking silly questions. Please.
translation.it: Ma ora controlla i miei movimenti, facendo domande stupide. Ma dai.

translation.en: OC is his friend.
And so? Hasn't it been long enough since we dated?
translation.it: E allora? Non è passato tanto tempo da quando uscivamo insieme?

translation.en: He doesn't own me, I can do anything I want.
translation.it: Non sono sua, posso fare cosa voglio.

translation.en: He probably has many girlfriends. You know how he is.
translation.it: Sai quante ragazze ha avuto? Sai com'è fatto.

translation.en: Please, let me drink my wine.
OC said I should stop drinking beer.
translation.it: OC ha detto che non dovrei più bere birra.

translation.en: Uh. Please, uh, get me that file.
Here it is, sir.
Thank you.
OC it was a struggle coming here today.
translation.it: OC, oggi è stato faticoso venire qui.

translation.en: I really struggled.
So if you want to see me again,
you'll have to start giving me taxi money.
translation.it: mi serviranno i soldi per il taxi.

translation.en: And I mean the proper taxis, not those rickety ones.
translation.it: E non un taxi qualsiasi, quelli belli, non quelli traballanti.

translation.en: That's no problem, you know.
Thank you. Because I have no money left.
I don't even have money for rent.
translation.it: Non ho neanche i soldi per l'affitto.

translation.en: That's no problem too, I'll take care of that.
translation.it: Neanche quello è un problema, ci penso io.

translation.en: Thank you.
You know, while you're at it, don't you think you need new shoes?
translation.it: Sai, già che ci siamo, non ti servirebbero scarpe nuove?

translation.en: Uh-uh. Why?
Your shoe is old.
From trekking now.
Your friend was right, you know? You should start wearing better shoes.
translation.it: La tua amica aveva ragione, dovresti mettere scarpe migliori.

translation.en: Who has time to wear high heels everywhere?
translation.it: Non ho tempo per andare ovunque con i tacchi.

translation.en: I'm only offering.
If you want to buy, no problem. Buy, I won't say no. As long as it's free.
translation.it: Se vuoi comprarle, non c'è problema. Non dico di no, purché sia gratis.

translation.en: Not exactly.
How?
You will have to do something for me.
translation.it: Dovrai fare una cosa per me.

translation.en: Your shoes are nice.
Really? You can have any you want.
translation.it: Davvero? Puoi avere quelle che vuoi.

translation.en: They're not my size.
Just tired. Today I did a lot of shopping.
translation.it: Sono stanca. Ho fatto troppo shopping.

translation.en: I shopped.
When are you going to start looking for another job?
translation.it: Quando ti cercherai un altro lavoro?

translation.en: I'm just saying, you don't want to get used to being at home for too long.
translation.it: - Perché? - È solo per dire. Meglio non abituarsi troppo a stare a casa.

translation.en: Ah, I'm not… I'm not looking for a job. I don't want to work again.
translation.it: Io non cercherò un altro lavoro. Non voglio più lavorare.

translation.en: OC said I shouldn't work, that he'll take care of me.
translation.it: OC dice che posso non lavorare, si prenderà cura di me.

translation.en: He even asked me to move in with him.
translation.it: Dice che dovrei trasferirmi da lui.

translation.en: What?
But I told him I wasn't ready.
translation.it: Ma gli ho detto che non sono pronta.

translation.en: He said I'm the kind of woman he would like to marry.
translation.it: Dice che sono il tipo di donna che vorrebbe sposare.

translation.en: -When? -Today.
After how many days of knowing you?
translation.it: E da quanti giorni ti conosce?

translation.en: Let me tell you something. You are not a child!
translation.it: Lascia che ti dica una cosa. Non sei una bambina!

translation.en: You cannot move into a house with a man you barely know. Or marry him.
translation.it: Non puoi andare a vivere con un uomo che conosci appena. O sposarlo.

translation.en: Anybody who does that kind of thing is clearly asking for trouble.
translation.it: Chiunque faccia una cosa del genere cerca chiaramente guai.

translation.en: No quarrel, is it your problem?
translation.it: Non litighiamo, è un problema tuo?

translation.en: Is it not my trouble?
It's your problem.
Silly girl.
Why are you so upset about it?
You know what baffles me the most about this whole thing?
translation.it: Sai cosa mi sconcerta di più di questa situazione?

translation.en: It's that it's been just three weeks since they started dating.
translation.it: Il fatto che sono solo tre settimane da quando si sono incontrati e lui le parla già di matrimonio.

translation.en: He's already talking about marriage.
translation.it: da quando si sono incontrati e lui le parla già di matrimonio.

translation.en: Look, Tolani, why don't you stop focusing on those people's business?
translation.it: Senti, perché non smetti di pensare agli affari altrui?

translation.en: Okay.
She doesn't work, she doesn't do anything.
translation.it: Lei non lavora, non fa niente.

translation.en: And she's always eating my food.
translation.it: E mangia sempre il mio cibo.

translation.en: Did she just start eating your food today?
She didn't just start eating my food today,
but what if she moves out and is no longer paying the rent?
translation.it: ma se si trasferisce e lui non paga più l'affitto,

translation.en: What would I do? Where would I go?
Okay. Whenever I ask her where he lives,
translation.it: Ok. Ogni volta che le chiedo dove vive lui,

translation.en: she says it's in Ikeja, it's in Along, or something else.
translation.it: lei dice che è a Ikeja, ad Along o da qualche altra parte.

translation.en: She has never once told me where he lives.
translation.it: Non mi dice mai dove vive.

translation.en: She's never told me! What is Rose hiding?
translation.it: Non me l'ha mai detto! Cosa nasconde Rose?

translation.en: -What exactly is she hiding? -Why don't you just ask her?
translation.it: - Cosa nasconde? - Perché non lo chiedi a lei?

translation.en: I should ask her? Have you not heard anything I've been saying?
translation.it: Dovrei chiederglielo? Ma hai sentito cos'ho detto?

translation.en: All this, I'm tired.
translation.it: Tutto quel che ho detto. Ora sono anche stanca.

translation.en: I'm tired of all this stress.
That reminds me, the business you wanted to do,
translation.it: Tra l'altro, l'affare che volevi fare,

translation.en: is your uncle giving you money for it?
translation.it: tuo zio ti dà i soldi?

translation.en: No.
I don't want him in my business at all.
translation.it: Non lo voglio coinvolto nei miei affari.

translation.en: Why?
When I establish this business, starts going well, bringing in money,
translation.it: Quando avvierò questa attività e inizierà ad andare bene e a fruttare.

translation.en: it'll mean I'm set and can be on my own.
translation.it: Vuol dire che potrò farcela da solo.

translation.en: Ah, that's good but,
where will you get money?
What do you think I've been running around for?
translation.it: Secondo te perché mi do tanto da fare?

translation.en: But, it would be too late.
That would take too long.
translation.it: Ci andrebbe troppo tempo. Possiamo fare così:

translation.en: I suggest I give you what little I have left of my savings,
translation.it: io ti do i miei pochi risparmi,

translation.en: so you can add it to the money you have. Eh?
translation.it: per aggiungerli a quelli che hai tu.

translation.en: And then you can start from there.
translation.it: E poi puoi iniziare da lì.

translation.en: Tolani, I didn't come here to beg for money.
translation.it: Tolani, non sono venuto qui per chiedere soldi.

translation.en: I know, Sanwo, I know you didn't come here to beg for money,
translation.it: Lo so, Sanwo, so che non sei venuto a chiedere soldi,

translation.en: but it'll take too long. Too long before you have enough .
translation.it: ma ci vorrà troppo tempo prima che tu abbia abbastanza soldi.

translation.en: Let me help you out.
What is happening?
-Ayo! -Yes?
-What are you doing there? -I'm playing.
You're playing? Look, let your mother catch you there,
translation.it: Stai giocando? Aspetta che tua madre ti veda lì,

translation.en: you'll be in real trouble.
translation.it: poi vedrai in che guai sarai.

translation.en: You're playing. Where is Philomena?
I don't know.
You don't know? Doesn't she know how much your mother pays her
translation.it: Non lo so. Non sa quanto la paga tua madre

translation.en: to watch over you guys, and you're playing all over the place.
translation.it: per guardarvi? E voi giocate dappertutto.

translation.en: Would you get off that place you're playing?
translation.it: Vuoi spostarti da lì, dove stai giocando?

translation.en: These children!
What is it? Should I let him hurt himself?
translation.it: Cosa c'è? Dovrei lasciare che si faccia del male?

translation.en: -Tolani. -Hmm?
The money you talked about earlier,
translation.it: I soldi di cui parlavi prima,

translation.en: uh, I have thought about it.
I'll take whatever amount you have. And I'll pay it back.
translation.it: Prenderò quello che hai e te lo ripagherò.

translation.en: Uh-huh.
But, I can't take the money from you,
translation.it: Ma non posso accettare soldi da te…

translation.en: when you're like this.
I hear you. I'll calm down until you're done.
translation.it: Ho capito. Mi calmerò quando avrai finito.

translation.en: I'll be expecting you.
You can have it.
-Thank you. -Bye.
Can you get me the file, please?
translation.it: Mi prendi quel file, per favore?

translation.en: What file, sir?
Hmm, quarterly budget.
-Mr. Salako! -Who is that?
translation.it: Sig. Salako. Chi è? Non sai bussare?

translation.en: Can't you knock?!
Can't you knock? See how her mouth is open.
translation.it: Sai bussare? Guarda come apre la bocca.

translation.en: -I thought you said I should come in. -No! I didn't say so.
translation.it: - Non mi aveva detto di venire? - No! Non l'ho detto.

translation.en: I didn't say. When did I say so?
translation.it: Non l'ho detto. Quando l'avrei detto?

translation.en: Get out! Get out.
What's that?
What can I do for you?
There's a messenger from First Bank, they asked to see you.
translation.it: C'è un inviato della First Bank che vuole vederla.

translation.en: Mm, tell the person to wait. Tell him to wait.
translation.it: Di' a quella persona di aspettare. Digli di aspettare.

translation.en: I'm busy. And let me warn you,
next time you, you come in like that, I will sack you.
translation.it: se la prossima volta entri così ti licenzio.

translation.en: Come on, go, go. Leave my office.
-Okay. -Mm.
Get the hell out. Keep on walking aimlessly.
translation.it: Fuori da qui. Guarda come va in giro inutilmente.

translation.en: Be going!
Where's the file?
-Here's the file, sir. -Let me have it!
Look at her.
Always walking seductively, shaking her butt.
translation.it: Cammina in modo seducente, muovendo il culo.

translation.en: I know what you're doing.
Tolani, this is what I'm saying.
You see, whatever the world about a person is not always who the person is.
translation.it: qualsiasi cosa il mondo dica di una persona, non la definisce.

translation.en: The person might not see themselves in that light.
translation.it: Quella persona potrebbe non pensare di essere così.

translation.en: Let me give you an example.
If a man comes and says,
"Ah, this girl is well mannered, she's virtuous, she's honorable."
Within you, you know it's possible that you're not all those things.
translation.it: Dentro di te sai che è possibile che tu non sia quelle cose.

translation.en: Do you understand?
The point I'm trying to make is this.
translation.it: Ciò che cerco di dire è questo.

translation.en: If you know you're well-mannered, virtuous, and honorable,
translation.it: Se tu sai di essere educata, virtuosa e rispettabile,

translation.en: you make sure to protect your reputation.
translation.it: assicurati di proteggere ciò che sei.

translation.en: You won't let life or any man take it away from you.
translation.it: Non lasciare che la vita o un uomo ti portino via chi sei.

translation.en: -Do you understand? -I understand, Mom.
-Are you sure? -I understand.
What kind of job do you do that you make this much money?
translation.it: Che lavoro fai per guadagnare così tanto?

translation.en: Hmm?
I'm asking because I want to make my own money.
translation.it: Lo chiedo perché voglio guadagnare soldi miei.

translation.en: You have a passport?
-Passport? Yes I have plenty of passports. -No, not that type.
translation.it: - Passaporto? Sì, ne ho tanti. - No, non di quel tipo.

translation.en: An international passport.
No, I don't.
Why?
You should've told me.
I've been suspecting that you were doing something illegal.
translation.it: Sospettavo che facessi qualcosa di illegale. Ma non pensavo…

translation.en: But I didn't know what.
I thought you were, um, trading dollars on the black market.
translation.it: Pensavo contrabbandassi dollari nel mercato nero.

translation.en: I knew it was something illegal.
Listen, OC,
I can do it.
I'm not afraid. I can do it.
Trust me.
Listen, when I was growing up, all these stupid old men started touching me,
translation.it: Da piccola, c'erano tutti quei vecchi che iniziavano a toccarmi

translation.en: but I learned how to fight them.
But poverty?
That's a different thing altogether. And I don't want to face it again.
translation.it: È un gioco diverso. Non voglio più affrontarla.

translation.en: I… I do not really know how to put this…
but, uh, certain information just reached my attention,
translation.it: ma mi sono giunte certe informazioni

translation.en: and I want to know if it is true.
translation.it: e vorrei sapere se è vero.

translation.en: What information?
Were you and Salako caught in flagrante delicto?
translation.it: Tu e Salako siete stati colti in flagranza di reato?

translation.en: What does that mean?
Well you know… you know, um…
Well?
Tell Franca to stay away from me.
translation.it: Dica a Franka di starmi lontana.

translation.en: That is not… I mean, that is not part of the issue here.
translation.it: Questo non ha a che fare con il problema.

translation.en: Really? Then you are like her then.
translation.it: Davvero? Allora voi due siete uguali.

translation.en: I'm sorry, uncle, I don't have time for this. Please, beans for me.
translation.it: Scusa, zio, non ho tempo per queste cose. Dei fagioli, per favore.

translation.en: Ayo! Eh!
We need a longer stick.
This is the only stick we could find.
translation.it: Quello è l'unico bastone che abbiamo trovato.

translation.en: Go across the road, there are bamboo sticks there.
translation.it: Vai dal sarto, lì ci sono bastoni di bambù.

translation.en: I don't want those people to know what is happening in this compound.
translation.it: Non voglio che i sarti sappiano cosa succede qui.

translation.en: Go there, don't let them know what's happening here.
translation.it: Vai, non fargli sapere cosa succede.

translation.en: Please help me go and collect a longer stick.
translation.it: Aiutami ad andare dal sarto a prendere un bastone più lungo.

translation.en: Where is the stick?
It is taking time.
Ayo fell into the septic tank. We're trying to get him out.
translation.it: Ayo è caduto dentro. Vogliamo tirarlo fuori.

translation.en: That Philomena is wicked.
-Where is she exactly? -She ran away.
If I see her, I'll personally beat her up. Then call the police to arrest her for me.
translation.it: Se la vedo, la prendo a botte. Poi chiamo la polizia per farla arrestare.

translation.en: The stick now! The stick. It's taking a long time.
translation.it: Il bastone, subito! Il bastone. Ci sta mettendo troppo.

translation.en: They're bringing it.
Somebody help me! Somebody help me!
Ayo, why?
-Ayo. -Where is he?
-Ayo. -Which Ayo?
I'm dead! Ayo!
I am dead! Help me bring him out!
-Don't let me lose my child, please! -Mama Ayo!
translation.it: - Non fatemi perdere mio figlio! - Mama Ayo!

translation.en: Please!
-Mama Ayo! -Help me carry him!
Take her away from here now. Help me bring him out!
translation.it: Portatela via da qui. Aiutatemi a tirarlo fuori!

translation.en: Sorry for your loss.
-May we not have any more loss. -So sorry.
Mother, They said I should do my hair before school tomorrow.
translation.it: Madre, dicono che dovrei sistemare i capelli prima di andare a scuola domani.

translation.en: God will comfort you.
Mother, why are you not talking?
Don't cry again.
Take heart. Sorry for your loss.
Stop crying. God will look… God will be with you both.
translation.it: Smettila di piangere. Dio guarderà… Dio sarà con tutti e due.

translation.en: Don't start crying again.
See that boy.
What is he doing there?
translation.it: - Che ci fa qui? - Cosa fa?

translation.en: -What is he doing this time of night? -Let's go find out.
translation.it: - Cosa fa qui a quest'ora? - Andiamo a scoprirlo.

translation.en: What are you doing here at this time?
translation.it: Cosa ci fai qui? A quest'ora?

translation.en: It's so late.
Isn't your mother looking for you?
Where did you come from?
-Get up. -Get up and go home!
translation.it: - Alzati. - Alzati e va' a casa!

translation.en: What are you all doing there?
Move out the way. Is that not Ayo?
I said move out of the way! Or are you deaf?
translation.it: Ho detto spostatevi! O siete sordi?

translation.en: Get away! Leave him alone.
What are you doing over there?
Your mother has been looking for you all over the place.
translation.it: Tua madre ti ha cercato dappertutto.

translation.en: All right. Let's go home. She'll beat me.
translation.it: - Dai, andiamo a casa. - Mi picchierà.

translation.en: Your mother won't beat you. Don't worry, let's go home.
translation.it: Non ti picchierà, non preoccuparti, andiamo a casa.

translation.en: Come on.
-[yelling] My life! -Ayo!
Have mercy on me. Please!
translation.it: Abbi pietà di me. Ti prego!

translation.en: -It's okay. -Help me get him, Mama Chidi.
translation.it: - Va tutto bene, Mama Ayo. - Tiriamolo fuori. Mama Chidi.

translation.en: God will help.
[Tolani] Excuse me. Excuse me, please.
-[man] Thank you God! -Ayo!
Where did you find him?!
God, I thank you sir.
Congratulations on the good luck!
-Where did you find him? -Ask him yourself.
-Ayo! -[man] Thank you, God!
Thank you, God! Neighbors, thank you.
translation.it: Grazie, Dio! Grazie a voi, vicini.

translation.en: [announcer] Oh, my goodness! Yes, Yemi is going closer.
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio! Sì, Yemi si avvicina.

translation.en: Yes. He stands a chance and… and… and it's a goal!
translation.it: Sì. Ha la possibilità e… ed è goal!

translation.en: [all] Goal!
Take it.
-Wait a minute. -Hmm?
What kind of business is this exactly?
translation.it: Che tipo di attività è di preciso?

translation.en: Fine.
Do you remember my friend, Moshood?
Who?
Have you forgotten Moshood?
That man that drives a Volkswagen Beetle around?
translation.it: È quello che guida un maggiolino Volkswagen?

translation.en: That's him. You know he knows a lot of soldiers.
translation.it: Esatto. Sai che conosce molti soldati.

translation.en: He imports dogs for them to protect their homes.
translation.it: Importa cani per loro, per proteggere le loro case.

translation.en: Dogs like Dobermans, Alsatian, Rottweiler.
Imported dogs, not all those local mongrels.
translation.it: Cani importati, non quei meticci locali.

translation.en: It's a very profitable venture. I've done my research.
translation.it: È un'attività molto remunerativa. Ho fatto delle ricerche.

translation.en: In fact, we should triple the initial investment.
I can assure you. I've done my research.
translation.it: Te lo assicuro, ho fatto delle ricerche.

translation.en: That's good. Give me my money.
translation.it: Va bene. Dammi i miei soldi.

translation.en: I took my savings from all the hard work I've been doing since the year started,
translation.it: Ho preso tutti miei risparmi sudati, che ho messo da parte da inizio anno,

translation.en: and I gave it to you and you're talking to me about Moshood and dogs?
translation.it: e li ho dati a te. E ora mi parli di Moshood e di cani.

translation.en: I thought you had a real business partner.
translation.it: Pensavo che avessi un vero partner.

translation.en: Or a good business plan.
Give me my money back. Thank you.
So, you don't even trust me.
translation.it: Quindi non ti fidi di me.

translation.en: After I told you I had done all my research.
translation.it: Dopo che ti ho detto di aver fatto delle ricerche.

translation.en: Okay. It's not like I wanted your money before. I'm not starving. Take.
translation.it: Ok. I tuoi soldi neanche li volevo. Non sono disperato. Prendili.

translation.en: All right, have some patience. Don't be angry.
translation.it: Va bene, sii paziente. Non arrabbiarti.

translation.en: I'm just being cautious.
This is all my life savings.
I'm just scared. Don't be angry.
All right, take.
Take.
I trust you.
Make sure you give me my profit.
translation.it: Però fammi avere i miei profitti.

translation.en: Okay, continue eating. Eat your food.
translation.it: Ok, continua a mangiare. Mangia il tuo cibo.

translation.en: Eat. You have too much pride.
Stop being insolent. I'm not going anywhere.
translation.it: Non vado via. Dobbiamo stare qui.

translation.en: We must finish this discussion.
Finish what? What gives you the right to come here and question me?
translation.it: Chiarire cosa? Cosa ti dà il diritto di venire a interrogarmi?

translation.en: Really?
-My friend, get out. -What is going on here?
Tell him to get out.
I'll go. But not until I say my peace.
translation.it: Me ne vado, ma dopo aver parlato.

translation.en: Say what? Leave!
Is that so? Your friend? She's not okay. She bit me
translation.it: Ah, è così? La tua amica? Non è a posto. Mi ha morso.

translation.en: So you don't want to leave? You don't want to leave?
translation.it: Non vuoi andartene, vero? Non vuoi andartene?

translation.en: Ah, look, don't mind her. I only just told her to be careful of OC.
translation.it: Senti, non ascoltarla. Le ho solo detto di fare attenzione con OC.

translation.en: Why?
They had a big fight! It was explosive!
You should've heard the things he said.
translation.it: Non hai sentito cosa le ha detto.

translation.en: Okay, you don't want to leave? Stay there! Stay there like a soldier.
translation.it: Ok, non vuoi andartene? Stai lì! Stai lì come un soldato.

translation.en: You and I will have it out. Stay. Wait.
translation.it: Io e te non staremo mai insieme. Rimani pure.

translation.en: Ooh. You two broke up over a year ago,
translation.it: Avete rotto più di un anno fa

translation.en: and I'm still here settling your quarrels. I'm surprised.
translation.it: e sono ancora qui a risolvere i vostri problemi.

translation.en: You should've heard the things OC said. You would be shocked.
translation.it: Dovevi sentire cosa le ha detto OC. Se lo sentissi rimarresti scioccata.

translation.en: What things?
Tell me.
All right, let's put it this way.
A man cannot respect you, if he insults you like that.
translation.it: Un uomo non può rispettarti, se è maleducato.

translation.en: What! I can't believe this is happening, you know.
translation.it: Cosa? Non posso credere che stia succedendo.

translation.en: I must be dreaming, you know.
-How dare you talk back, hungry whore! -No, I--
translation.it: Come osi rispondermi? - Non ho… - Puttana!

translation.en: What…
You hungry whore!
-Did you hear what he called me? -She's not good in bed.
translation.it: Hai sentito come mi ha chiamata? Brutto figlio di…

translation.en: She's not good in bed you know! You can't be compared to my girl
translation.it: A letto non è brava! Non è niente in confronto

translation.en: -Natasha in Chicago! -I've slept with better men than you!
translation.it: - a Natasha di Chicago! - Ho avuto uomini migliori.

translation.en: You can't be compared to my girl Amanda in Atlanta!
translation.it: - O ad Amanda ad Atlanta! - Non incolpare me.

translation.en: -Go back to Atlanta! -You can't be compared to my girl Aliya
translation.it: - O ad Aliya. - Torna ad Atlanta! Che ci fai qui?

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -You know!
translation.it: - Cosa ci fai qui? - A New York!

translation.en: Babe, talk to your friend.
I only met OC four years ago and since that time,
translation.it: ho conosciuto OC quattro anni fa, e da allora

translation.en: he's been living in the United States.
I don't even know what he does there.
translation.it: Non so neanche cosa faccia qui.

translation.en: -You said he was your friend! -Yo! Everyone is my friend.
translation.it: - Hai detto che era tuo amico! - Ehi! Sono tutti miei amici.

translation.en: -I'm surprised at you Johnny. -Me? Is that so? She was my girl!
translation.it: - Mi stupisco di te, Johnny. - Di me? Davvero? È la mia ragazza.

translation.en: She's the one that decided to jump ship and date OC.
translation.it: Ha deciso lei di troncare e di frequentare OC.

translation.en: You won't leave!
-You should stay so I can stab you! -What is wrong with you?
translation.it: - Rimani, così ti ammazzo. - Cos'hai che non va?

translation.en: -Please leave me! Leave me! -Ah! What is wrong with you?
translation.it: - Lasciami stare! Lasciami! - Che cosa ti prende?

translation.en: I come in here and both of you are acting like area boys.
translation.it: Vengo qui e vi trovo a litigare come ragazzini.

translation.en: Nobody cares about Rose. Every man just wants to use Rose.
translation.it: A nessuno importa di Rose. Gli uomini vogliono solo usarla.

translation.en: How many things has Johnny ever bought for me?
translation.it: Quante cose mi ha comprato Johnny?

translation.en: Coming here asking me questions, monitoring my movement.
translation.it: E viene qui a farmi domande e a tenermi d'occhio.

translation.en: Buy is not love. As for OC,
translation.it: Comprare non è amore. In quanto a OC,

translation.en: if he really insults you like that, then he does not like you. You hear me?
translation.it: se ti insulta in quel modo, allora non gli piaci. Hai capito?

translation.en: He does not like you. It's a mistake to be with that man.
translation.it: Non gli piaci. È un errore averci a che fare.

translation.en: Don't tell me that. I know what I'm doing.
translation.it: Non dirmi che non so cosa faccio, so cosa faccio. È in errore chi va in giro

translation.en: A mistake is somebody that walks around
translation.it: so cosa faccio. È in errore chi va in giro

translation.en: thinking the world would change because of them.
translation.it: pensando che il mondo cambierà grazie a lui.

translation.en: Very good. You can do anything you want!
translation.it: Molto bene. Puoi fare quello che vuoi!

translation.en: With whoever you want. In fact, you can go anywhere with whoever you want.
translation.it: Con chiunque vuoi. Anzi, puoi andare ovunque con chiunque tu voglia.

translation.en: But let me remind you, I live in this house and I pay my rent.
translation.it: Ma ti ricordo una cosa, io vivo in questa casa e pago l'affitto.

translation.en: So if you give me problems, I will give you problems back!
translation.it: Quindi se mi dai dei problemi, te ne do anch'io!

translation.en: I will give you problems back.
Go, walk away and don't hear what I'm saying.
translation.it: Se te ne vai e non mi ascolti.

translation.en: Look at the mess.
It's true that I don't have anybody in Lagos to help me.
translation.it: È vero, non ho nessun altro a Lagos che mi aiuti.

translation.en: But please, if I'm going to work for you, don't insult me like that again.
translation.it: Ma ti prego, se lavorerò per te, non insultarmi mai più così.

translation.en: I'm begging you.
translation.it: Ti prego, in nome di Dio.

translation.en: -Miss Tolani Ajao. -Yes, sir?
Uh, please, check that cabinet and get me a file.
translation.it: Per favore, controlla nell'armadietto e prendimi un file.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I cannot, sir.
-Why not? -My leg.
Your leg? What is wrong about your leg? What happened?
translation.it: La tua gamba? Che problemi ha la tua gamba? Cos'è successo?

translation.en: I fell down on the bus, and it's paining me, sir.
translation.it: Sono caduta sull'autobus, mi fa molto male, signore.

translation.en: Oh. Stop being deceptive. You fell down?
-You? You fall out from a bus? -Yes sir.
And you did not somersault? You didn't somersault like a monkey?
translation.it: E non hai fatto una capriola come una scimmia?

translation.en: -Uh, when was this? -Today.
-Today? -Yes, sir.
Okay, show me.
I twisted it, so you cannot see it.
translation.it: È una storta, non si vede.

translation.en: Show me.
-This is it, sir. -Ah.
You're telling a lie. It's a lie. You're lying.
translation.it: Dici bugie. È una bugia. Stai mentendo.

translation.en: Ah! This thing did not happen today. This one did not happen today. Stop lying!
translation.it: Questa cosa non è successa oggi. Smettila di mentire!

translation.en: It's still paining me, sir, and I cannot bend until it heals.
translation.it: Mi fa ancora male, non riesco a piegarmi finché non guarisce.

translation.en: -Really? -Yes, sir.
All right. Then you take a memo for me.
translation.it: Va bene. Scrivi una nota per me.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
I'm going to make you so miserable
until you'll realize who is the boss, you worthless thing.
translation.it: così capirai che sono io il capo. Essere inutile.

translation.en: I'm here, sir.
To personnel. Regarding Tolani Ajao.
translation.it: All'ufficio del personale. Re: Tolani Ajao.

translation.en: I wish to lay an official complaint about my secretary.
translation.it: Vorrei… presentare un reclamo ufficiale sulla mia segretaria.

translation.en: Miss Tolani Ajao.
This morning,
I asked her to get me a file from my cabinet,
translation.it: le ho chiesto di portarmi un file dal mio armadietto,

translation.en: and she refused bluntly.
She became recalcitrant.
How do you spell that, sir?
Check your dictionary, dullard. Didn't you go to school?
translation.it: Controlla il dizionario, stupida. Non sei andata a scuola?

translation.en: And when you're asked you're quick to say you understand English.
translation.it: E quando te l'ho chiesto hai detto subito che capisci l'inglese.

translation.en: But you don't know how to spell a simple word.
translation.it: Ma non sai scrivere una semplice parola.

translation.en: Recalcitrant. Ah.
Make sure you type the memo for me.
translation.it: Vedi di battermi a macchina questa nota.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Wait a minute, what do you call yourself?
translation.it: Un attimo, tu come ti definisci?

translation.en: Eh? Who do you think you are?
And you are just a commoner. An ordinary person.
translation.it: Sei solo una persona comune. Ordinaria.

translation.en: -Is that also part of the memo, sir? -That is your own cup of tea.
translation.it: - Anche quello è per la nota? - Questo è solo per te.

translation.en: If you don't know. Write your response for records purposes.
translation.it: Se non lo sai. Scrivi la tua risposta da mettere a verbale.

translation.en: I will.
Get out of my sight. I'll make sure your job is history.
translation.it: Togliti di torno. Mi assicurerò che il tuo lavoro sia soltanto un ricordo.

translation.en: I'm going to frustrate you. You worthless thing.
I notice a missing semicolon in your response.
translation.it: Noto che manca un punto e virgola nella tua risposta.

translation.en: I'll write it in, sir.
And a misplaced predicate.
translation.it: E un predicato nel posto sbagliato.

translation.en: Unfortunately, you'll have to type it out again.
Why?
An employee cannot amend internal documents by hand.
translation.it: Un impiegato non può modificare documenti interni a mano.

translation.en: If everyone does that,
then we won't be able to differentiate the originals from the fakes.
translation.it: Non si distinguerebbero gli originali dai falsi.

translation.en: I'll type it in if that's what you want, sir.
translation.it: Lo scriverò. Se è questo che vuole.

translation.en: At any rate, I cannot accept this response as it stands.
translation.it: In ogni caso, non posso accettare questa risposta, per com'è scritta ora.

translation.en: Why not?
Your allegations,
they're rather… shocking.
Of course! What happened to me shocked me too.
translation.it: Certo! Quel che mi è successo ha scioccato anche me.

translation.en: It's unprecedented and I don't think I…
translation.it: È senza precedenti. E non penso di poterlo presentare.

translation.en: I can file it.
translation.it: E non penso di poterlo presentare.

translation.en: And why not?
Mr. Salako is a married man.
translation.it: Il sig. Salako è un uomo sposato.

translation.en: Your madam too is a married woman.
translation.it: Anche sua moglie è una donna sposata.

translation.en: And I've never heard of her assaulting anyone.
translation.it: Eppure non mi pare abbia mai aggredito qualcuno.

translation.en: Look.
For as long as I've been supervisor in personnel,
translation.it: Fin da quando sono supervisore del personale,

translation.en: I have never discussed this kind of case with her.
translation.it: non ho mai discusso di questo tipo di cose con lei.

translation.en: Now, do you realize the implications of what you're doing?
translation.it: Ora, ti rendi conto delle implicazioni di quello che stai facendo?

translation.en: Yes.
All right.
Ah. So you don't even want to speak to us any longer.
translation.it: Quindi ora non vuoi più parlarci.

translation.en: Anyway, I understand.
Anyone asking me now, "What's happening to Tolani?"
I just tell them "Leave her alone."
"She's working for Salako now."
Ah! And it cannot be easy.
Ah! You know, learning a new--
Be quiet! Keep your mouth shut!
-Me? -Yes.
And if you don't keep quiet, you will end up on this ground.

translation.en: I'm in the accounting department.
At least you'll be able to move out.
translation.it: Almeno andrai via da casa dei tuoi.

translation.en: Tolani, what happened?
I called your office, Godwin said Salako sacked you for misconduct.
translation.it: Ho chiamato l'ufficio, Godwin ha detto che ti hanno licenziata per cattiva condotta.

translation.en: When I pressed him further,
he said Mrs. Archibong queried Salako and suspended him.
translation.it: ha detto che la sig.ra Archibong ha interrogato Salako e l'ha sospeso.

translation.en: That suspension is how he'll lose his job.
translation.it: Perderà il lavoro per quella sospensione.

translation.en: May God let her read what I wrote in my report.
translation.it: Che Dio le faccia leggere il mio rapporto.

translation.en: She'll see that Rose and I were not crazy.
translation.it: Vedrà che io e Rose non siamo pazze.

translation.en: He doesn't know who he's dealing with. He doesn't know your spirit.
translation.it: Lui non sa con chi ha a che fare. Non sa che sei testarda.

translation.en: What are you going to do now?
I don't know yet. I don't know.
translation.it: Non lo so ancora. Non lo so.

translation.en: This is the money you loaned me.
translation.it: I soldi che mi hai prestato.

translation.en: Take it.
And I'll give you more before the end of the month.
translation.it: E te ne darò altri entro la fine del mese.

translation.en: For the suffering you went through.
translation.it: Perché hai sofferto a causa mia.

translation.en: This is enough.
You tried.
It's not up to you to decide.
Thank you.
[Tolani] You did everything you could to try and drive me away.
translation.it: Non hai fatto nulla per inseguirmi, dopo quello.

translation.en: -It's not like that. -It's not like that? How is it then?
translation.it: - Non è così. - Non è così? E com'è allora?

translation.en: Can you not remember all the rubbish you did?
translation.it: Con tutte le cavolate che hai fatto, non ti ricordi?

translation.en: -You're the one who did rubbish. -Me, doing rubbish?
translation.it: - Sei tu quella che ha fatto cavolate. - Io?

translation.en: Stop lying.
-Tolani. -Mm?
You know only rich people get married before they're 40.
translation.it: Sai che solo i ricchi si sposano prima dei 40 anni.

translation.en: I'm not important? Money is more important than me.
translation.it: Io non sono importante? I soldi sono più importanti di me.

translation.en: Don't say that.
translation.it: - Non dire così. - Dopo tutti i problemi che mi hai dato.

translation.en: After all the trouble you caused me. You think I'll let you go that easily?
translation.it: - Non dire così. - Dopo tutti i problemi che mi hai dato. Pensi che ti lascerò andare facilmente?

translation.en: That reminds me. I forgot to ask you, where's Rose?
translation.it: Tra l'altro. Ho dimenticato di chiedertelo, dov'è Rose?

translation.en: Good afternoon.
Mama Chidi said she wasn't home.
translation.it: Mama Chidi ha detto che non c'era.

translation.en: Rose has gone home.
That's good. We all need rest.
That reminds me, Sanwo, please,
help me give my landlord this one and give Violet this one.
translation.it: aiutami a dare questi al padrone di casa e dai questi a Violet.

translation.en: And you know my furniture? I want you to send it to me when you get to Lagos.
translation.it: E vorrei che mi spedissi i miei mobili quando torni a Lagos.

translation.en: Or maybe you should help me sell them and send the money.
translation.it: O forse dovresti aiutarmi a venderli e mandarmi i soldi.

translation.en: Tolani. Say it one at a time.
All right, don't be upset. I'll write it all down.
translation.it: Va bene, non arrabbiarti. Ti scrivo tutto.

translation.en: But can I trust you to follow through?
translation.it: Ma riuscirai a fare queste cose, una alla volta?

translation.en: -I've told you before, I'm not a bastard. -Alright, I've hear you. Don't be angry.
translation.it: - Te l'ho detto, non sono un bastardo. - Va bene. Non arrabbiarti.

translation.en: -Sorry. -[driver] No worries, sir.
Subtitle translation by Jerrold Cameron
